                java.io.IOException

        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • decompress

        public void decompress(Node node,
                       BinaryInput bi,
                       java.io.DataOutputStream dos)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Decompresses the original data by finding the next symbol with findNextSymbol method and then writes the symbol into output file. Symbol Â£ is used to mark the end of line.
        Parameters:
        node - Node, the root node of Huffman's tree.
        bi - BinaryInput, the input file stream.
        fos - FileOutputStream, file output stream used for writing output file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • findNextSymbol

        public char findNextSymbol(Node node,
                           BinaryInput bi)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Method that uses Huffman's tree to find next symbol to be written into output file.
        Parameters:
        node - Node, the root of Huffman's tree.
        bi - BinaryInput, the input stream, used for reading bits.
        Returns:
        returns the right symbol from Huffman's tree.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • readFrequenciesFromFile

        public HashMap<java.lang.Character,java.lang.Integer> readFrequenciesFromFile(BinaryInput bi)
                                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Method that reads the symbols and their frequencies from input stream. Symbol $ is used to mark the end of frequencies.
        Parameters:
        bi - BinaryInput, the binary input stream of compressed file.
        Returns:
        frequencies, HashMap, contains symbols and its frequencies.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
